message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000.

I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was hoping to negotiate a better price. I'm willing to pay $1400000 for the product. I believe it's a great opportunity, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I believe the product's value is worth more than $1400000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. I'm counteroffering at $1600000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1350000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering the value you've placed on it.

Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm starting to feel like we're getting a bit too far apart. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing out on the value of the product. I'm counteroffering at $1550000, which is just $50000 below my original price. I think it's a fair compromise.

I understand your concerns, Alice, and I appreciate your willingness to make a concession. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1300000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering the value you've placed on it, and I'm willing to meet you halfway again.
